Uses of Package
events

  • Packages that use events 
    Package Description
    applicationLayer  
    events  
    guiLayer  
  • Classes in events used by applicationLayer 
    Class Description
    DomainListener
    A DomainListener is a listener that's able to update the domain and implements actions corresponding to events emerging from the domain.
    DomainSubject
    A DomainSubject maintains it's list of DomainListeners and fires the DomainEvents.
    GUIListener
    A GUIlistener resides in the GUI layer and updates the GUI according to events emerging from the domain.
    GUISubject
    A GUISubject maintains it's list of GUIListeners and fires the DomainEvents.
    ResetExecutionEvent
    The event thrown when the execution needs to be reset.
    UpdateGameStateEvent
    The event thrown when the GameState needs to be updated.
  • Classes in events used by events 
    Class Description
    BlockAddedEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been added to the domain.
    BlockChangeEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been changed in the domain.
    BlockRemovedEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been removed from the domain.
    DomainListener
    A DomainListener is a listener that's able to update the domain and implements actions corresponding to events emerging from the domain.
    ElementAddedEvent
    The event thrown when an element has been added to the domain.
    EventObject
    This interface servers as a Group for all eventObjects.
    EventTaglet
    EventTaglet is used to create the event tags in the javadoc.
    GUIListener
    A GUIlistener resides in the GUI layer and updates the GUI according to events emerging from the domain.
    PanelChangeEvent
    The event thrown when a panelChange is requested.
    ResetExecutionEvent
    The event thrown when the execution needs to be reset.
    RobotAddedEvent
    The event thrown when the robot has been added to the domain.
    RobotChangeEvent
    The event thrown when the robot has been changed in the domain.
    UpdateGameStateEvent
    The event thrown when the GameState needs to be updated.
    UpdateHighlightingEvent
    The event thrown when a new block needs to be highlighted in the GUI.
  • Classes in events used by guiLayer 
    Class Description
    BlockAddedEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been added to the domain.
    BlockChangeEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been changed in the domain.
    BlockRemovedEvent
    The event thrown when a block has been removed from the domain.
    ElementAddedEvent
    The event thrown when an element has been added to the domain.
    GUIListener
    A GUIlistener resides in the GUI layer and updates the GUI according to events emerging from the domain.
    PanelChangeEvent
    The event thrown when a panelChange is requested.
    RobotAddedEvent
    The event thrown when the robot has been added to the domain.
    RobotChangeEvent
    The event thrown when the robot has been changed in the domain.
    UpdateHighlightingEvent
    The event thrown when a new block needs to be highlighted in the GUI.
